name: Poly Knight
description:
A low poly, 3D sidescroller with platforms, puzzles and bosses, you play as the Poly Knight on the way back from a quest, 12 levels and 2 bosses stand between you and your home tower.

After starting the game click on a circle in the world map to select a level, then collect enough tokens in each of the levels (there are 3 in each) to reach the end of the game. The top of the screen shows your collected coins, tokens and lives, 50 coins = 1 life.

Known glitches:

The Gator boss sometimes plays animations upside down when it's on the floor, and vice versa, can still be beaten if this happens

Sword attack sometimes stops working, if this happens just exit the level and start again, sorry, you've won't lose a life though
